question:
Which of the following Chola king allied with the Pallavas and defeated Pandyas and as a recompense received some
territories in the Tanjore area?
explanation:
Aditya I who ruled from c.871 to 907 CE allied with the Pallavas and defeated Pandyas and as a recompense received some
territories in the Tanjore area, at the battle of Shripurambiyam.
